explanation-en-US:
# ğŸ›ï¸ The Mistake (Passive Voice)

Use **Be + Past Participle** when the focus is on the object, not the doer.

1. **[was made]**: A mistake was made.
2. **[was written]**: Report was written.
3. **[was built]**: House was built.
4. **[is spoken]**: English is spoken.
5. **[was caught]**: Thief was caught.
6. **[was painted]**: It was painted.

title: Made In
content: This car [is made|makes] in Japan. Phones [are made|make] in China.

title: Was Born
content: I [was born|born] in 1990. She [was born|born] in May.

title: Was Built
content: The house [was built|built] in 1900. The bridge [was built|built] last year.

title: Is Spoken
content: English [is spoken|speaks] here. Spanish [is spoken|speaks] in Mexico.

title: Will Be
content: Note: Work [will be finished|will finish] tomorrow. It [will be done|will do] soon.

title: Has Been
content: The room [has been cleaned|has cleaned]. The car [has been fixed|has fixed].

title: Is Being
content: The road [is being repaired|is repairing]. The house [is being painted|is painting].

title: Was Written
content: Harry Potter [was written|wrote] by J.K. Rowling. Hamlet [was written|wrote] by Shakespeare.

title: Are Sold
content: Tickets [are sold|sell] online. Cookies [are sold|sell] here.

title: Were Discoverd
content: Valuables [were found|found] in the cave. Mistakes [were made|made].

title: Surprise
content: I [was surprised|surprised] by the news. She [was shocked|shocked].

title: Allowed
content: Dogs [are not allowed|do not allow] here. Smoking [is prohibited|prohibits].

title: Invited
content: I [was invited|invited] to the party. He [was not invited|did not invite].

title: Stolen
content: My wallet [was stolen|stole]. Her bag [has been stolen|has stolen].
